item.description:
Bi-Monthly Networking Event at 33 Restaurant

This is an informal social event, where you can get to know people and build
relationships. We plan to hold networking socials on the 1st & 3rd Thursdays
of the month.

We aim to create a positive, relaxed atmosphere, were people can meet new
friends and business contacts. In the coming months we will also invite
speakers who will help us hone our networking skills, learn the art of small talk and
promote our professional skills in the workplace. Please bring ideas for
future meeting topics and seminars.

Our first event will be Thursday, August 21, 2008. The event will start at
6:30 pm and we will continue to network until 10 pm.

This event is FREE. Door prizes will be given away. Must be present to win.

Bring your business cards, your smile and your networking skills and meet great
people.

Please email me you name, company and names of any guests. Please feel free to
pass this on to anyone else you think would be interested.

See you on the 21st!

Qiana Christian
item.name: Boston Professionals of Color Networking Event @ 33 Restaurant & Lounge
